login.title: Welcome.
login.label: If you already have a BFBAN account, log in now.

permission.title: Authority
permission.label: Touch the lower unit according to your needs to pre-authorize the application permissions; Here is not mandatory, to specific functions under the program will prompt you to unauthorized access to ask; Some functions are not authorized and will not affect the overall APP use
permission.tip: If the "permanent reject" option exists, you can go to Settings > Application > Permissions can be changed at any time
